MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL23 postcode area of Bala, affecting properties in Llanuwchllyn and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.27PM. Our engineers are on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a faulty transformer. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored, with a generator, by 9.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.10PM on 25th February 2021.
